name: Balloony Road
description:
A game I have been working on for a while (almost 4 months). I tried to make it as fun as posibble. I will try to release it on mobile platforms to download and play for free (with continue ads and maybe in-game cosmetic purchases). It is made in Godot (free open-source game engine). I used PICO-8 secret palette (with some additions). Art is belong to me. Font I used is called Press-start 2D. 

                                          

Credits (again):
  • Programming: Me
  • Art/Assets: Me
  • Font: Press-start 2D

Note: The game has no sounds/musics at the moment. I will add them in the future

If you have any feedback or bug report feel free to contact me on discord. My username is Nicat#3748. Don't forget to introduce yourself before sending any messages (like you come from itch and you want to tell me something about game)

My Accounts:

Github: https://github.com/Nicat5

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/nicatpng

Twitter: https://twitter.com/nicatpng

Thanks you for clicking to this page and supporting me with reading those!
